embed.title: 🚀 Pegasus Bot Commands
embed.description: Here are all available commands organized by category:
embed.footer: Use /help <command> for detailed information about a specific command

level.description: Show your current level and XP progress
level.user_description: Show level information for a specific user
level.user_not_found: ❌ User not found in this server.
level.no_xp: ❌ No XP data found for this user.

embed.title: 🏆 Server Leaderboard
embed.description: Top users by XP in this server:
embed.monthly_description: Top users by monthly XP (28-day cycle):

color.description: Change your level card color (hex color)
color.invalid: ❌ Invalid hex color. Please use format: #RRGGBB

background.description: Change your level card background image

resetxp.type_description: Type of reset (monthly, total, or current)

confirmation.title: ⚠️ Confirm XP Reset
confirmation.user: Are you sure you want to reset {{type}} XP for {{user}}?
confirmation.guild: Are you sure you want to reset {{type}} XP for the entire server ({{count}} users)?

resetxp.error: ❌ Failed to reset XP. Please try again.
resetxp.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command.

freezexp.description: Freeze/unfreeze users from gaining XP (Admin only)

success.unfreeze: ✅ Unfrozen {{user}} - they can now gain XP again

freezexp.already_frozen: ❌ {{user}} is already frozen from gaining XP.
freezexp.error: ❌ Failed to {{action}} user. Please try again.
freezexp.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command.

errors.generic: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command.
errors.cooldown: ⏰ You're on cooldown. Try again in {{time}}.
errors.guild_only: ❌ This command can only be used in a server.
errors.bot_missing_permissions: ❌ I don't have the required permissions to execute this command.

warn.higher_role: ❌ You cannot warn users with a higher or equal role.
warn.title: ⚠️ User Warned

delwarn.not_found: ❌ Warning #{{id}} not found in this server.
delwarn.title: 🗑️ Warning Deleted
delwarn.dm_description:
A warning has been removed from your record in **{{guild}}**

**Warning ID:** #{{id}}

editwarn.no_changes: ❌ Please provide at least one change (reason or duration).
editwarn.not_found: ❌ Active warning #{{id}} not found in this server.
editwarn.title: ✏️ Warning Edited
editwarn.dm_description:
A warning has been updated in **{{guild}}**

**Warning ID:** #{{id}}

ban.cannot_ban: ❌ I cannot ban this user. They may have a higher role than me.
ban.higher_role: ❌ You cannot ban users with a higher or equal role.
ban.title: 🔨 User Banned
ban.error: ❌ Failed to ban user. Please check permissions.

timeout.cannot_timeout: ❌ I cannot timeout this user. They may have a higher role than me.
timeout.higher_role: ❌ You cannot timeout users with a higher or equal role.
timeout.title: ⏰ User Timed Out
timeout.error: ❌ Failed to timeout user. Please check permissions.

kick.cannot_kick: ❌ I cannot kick this user. They may have a higher role than me.
kick.higher_role: ❌ You cannot kick users with a higher or equal role.
kick.title: 👢 User Kicked
kick.error: ❌ Failed to kick user. Please check permissions.

quarantine.higher_role: ❌ You cannot quarantine users with a higher or equal role.
quarantine.already_quarantined: ❌ This user is already in quarantine.
quarantine.not_quarantined: ❌ This user is not in quarantine.
quarantine.remove_description: {{user}} has been removed from quarantine by {{moderator}}
quarantine.error: ❌ Failed to quarantine user. Please check permissions.
quarantine.remove_error: ❌ Failed to remove quarantine. Please check permissions.
quarantine.dm_remove_description:
Your quarantine has been lifted in **{{guild}}**

Your roles have been restored.
